seo.title: Foundi – Simple and secure personal finance
seo.description: Foundi is a modern personal finance platform that helps you organize, understand, and improve your relationship with money. Track your expenses, create healthy financial habits, and keep full control of your privacy. Coming soon for everyone.
seo.ogTitle: Foundi – A new way to understand your finances
seo.ogDescription: Discover Foundi, the web platform that helps you stay in control of your personal finances in a simple, clear, and secure way.
seo.twitterTitle: Foundi – Simple and secure personal finance
seo.twitterDescription: Organize your money with Foundi. Simple, private, and designed for real people. Coming soon.
seo.author: Foundi Team
